content:
Implementers have been asking for a cross-mapping of search parameters across versions.

Here's a spreadsheet I made that has a draft of a parameter cross map

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cyHe9qR4-YY1hP6wd2o_90gxrgaFW5aCqKYMavo6P3I/edit?usp=sharing
ping on this - discussed in the reference implementers forum last night
